Segment.name: SDQ
Segment.comment: To specify destination and quantity detail

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity1
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity2
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode3
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity3
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode4
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity4
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode5
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity5
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode6
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity6
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode7
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity7
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode8
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity8
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode9
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity9
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: IdentificationCode10
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Quantity10
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ05 or SDQ06 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ07 or SDQ08 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ09 or SDQ10 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1112
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ11 or SDQ12 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1314
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ13 or SDQ14 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1516
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ15 or SDQ16 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1718
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ17 or SDQ18 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1920
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ19 or SDQ20 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P2122
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SDQ21 or SDQ22 is present, then the other is required.
